Documentation API Reference

Chat Completions API

The Chat Completions API allows you to generate conversational responses using Claude models.

Authentication

All API requests require authentication using an API key:

curl https://api.anthropic.com/v1/messages \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer $API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json"

Request Format

Send a POST request to /v1/messages with the following structure:

{
  "model": "claude-3-sonnet-20240229",
  "max_tokens": 1000,
  "messages": [
    {
      "role": "user",
      "content": "Hello, Claude!"
    }
  ]
}

Parameters

Parameter Type Required Description
model string Yes The model to use for completion
messages array Yes List of messages in the conversation
max_tokens integer Yes Maximum number of tokens to generate

Note

The API uses token-based pricing. Each request consumes tokens based on input and output length.

Response Format

The API returns a JSON response:

{
  "id": "msg_123",
  "type": "message",
  "role": "assistant",
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Hello! How can I help you today?"
    }
  ],
  "model": "claude-3-sonnet-20240229",
  "usage": {
    "input_tokens": 10,
    "output_tokens": 25
  }
}

⚠️ Rate limits apply to all API calls. See the rate limiting documentation for details.
